mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_menu a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort
SELECT a.logid, a.parent_id AS "parent.logid", a.parent_ids FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.logid = a.parent_id JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.logid JOIN sys_role r ON r.logid = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.logid JOIN sys_user u ON u.logid = ur.user_id AND u.logid = #{userId} WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND r.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND u.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY a.sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( logid, parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, target, icon, sort, is_show, permission, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{logid}, #{parent.logid}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{createBy.logid}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.logid}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parent.logid}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, update_by = #{updateBy.logid}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE logid = #{logid}
UPDATE sys_menu SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE logid = #{logid} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{logid}||',%' '%,'+#{logid}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{logid}, ',%')
